subtitle: Serve this lovely Irish starter with soda bread.

method.text: Arrange the trout fillets in an ovenproof casserole dish. Pour over the cider. Scatter over the lemon slices and sprigs of herbs.
In a bowl, beat the butter together with the spices and seasoning. Dot a little of the spiced butter over the fish.
Cover and cook in oven for 30-40 min or until fish is cooked.
Remove from oven. Leave to cool.
Remove the trout from the casserole dish. Roughly flake and remove any skin. Divide the trout between individual small dishes or ramekins.
Gently melt the remaining spiced butter in a pan for 1 min. Pour the melted butter over each dish to seal. Leave in a cool place until set. Serve at room temperature.

title: Tipperary potted trout
